summary: Computer Programming graduate from Humber College with a strong foundation in full-stack development, databases, and software engineering principles. Experienced in building web, mobile, and database-driven applications using Java, Python, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and SQL. Passionate about problem solving, automation, and scalable system design. Comfortable working in Agile environments and collaborating with cross-functional teams. Continuously learning new technologies and seeking opportunities to contribute to impactful software and data engineering projects.
